questions.question_text:
A project manager is overseeing a multinational project, and team leaders from numerous countries indicate the team members have low morale.
Which of the following is the MOST likely reason the project manager would be unaware of the team member's decreased morale?

choices.C: The project manager did not prioritize team member concerns.
choices.D: The project manager did not visit the project's international office locations.
choices.B: The project manager did not perform active listening.
choices.A: The project manager did not pay attention to visual cues.

A Chief Executive Officer (CEO) has approached a project team member to request a project change.
Which of the following would be the BEST step for the project manager to take to prevent scope creep?

choices.D: Ask the CEO to follow the communications plan.
choices.C: Submit the request to the CCB.

discussion.content: C. Submit the request to the CCB.
